definition: variant of 升[sheng1]/to ascend/to rise in rank
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
to ascend/to rise to the rank of/to promote/to hoist/liter/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth dou 斗[dou3]
to rise to the sky/to lift off/to levitate/liftoff
to levitate heavenwards (a Daoist success)/to take off/to soar (of prices)
rising tone (phonetics, e.g. on a question in English)
Bi Sheng (990-1051), inventor of movable type
lit. the golden bird of the sun sets in the west, the jade hare of the moon rises in the east/fig. at sunset
pinyin: jin1 wu1 xi1 zhui4 , yu4 tu4 dong1 sheng1

definition: Han Seung Soo (1936-), South Korean diplomat and politician, prime minister from 2008

sentences.english: The sun rises late and set early.
The sun rose and smiled on it.
sentences.chinese: 太陽昇上來了，向無名花微笑。

sentences.english: The sun rose to the mid sky and doves cooed in the shade.
sentences.chinese: 太陽昇到中天，鴿子在涼蔭中叫喚。

sentences.english: Dawn is the first light in the sky as the sun rises.
sentences.chinese: 當太陽昇起，天剛亮的時候叫做黎明。

sentences.english: As the sun rose, a dew drop became aware of its surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 太陽昇起時，一顆露珠兒才知道了自己身處何處。

sentences.english: When the sun comes up, Hansel and Gretel try to find their way home.
sentences.chinese: 太陽昇起時，漢瑟和葛麗特想要找到回家的路。

sentences.english: The fog dissipated when the sun rose.
sentences.chinese: 當太陽昇起時霧漸漸消散。

sentences.english: The days are short and the nights are long. The sun rises late and sets early.
sentences.chinese: 因爲此時白天短而夜晚長，太陽昇得遲而落得早。

sentences.english: As the sun rose over the horizon, I went out to enjoy the beauty of the grassland scenery.
sentences.chinese: 當太陽昇過地平線時，我走出屋外來欣賞草原的美景。

sentences.english: The clouds rolled away as the sun rose higher.
The best time to run/walk on hot days is before the sun gets above the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 天熱時最佳的跑走時機是在太陽昇起地平線之前。

sentences.english: The sun rises earlier and sets later. (
sentences.chinese: 太陽昇得更早，落的更晚些。

sentences.english: As the solarise chromatic over the horizon, I went out to savor the loveliness of the grassland landscape.
sentences.chinese: 當太陽昇過地平線時，我走出屋外來欣賞草原的美景。

sentences.english: As the sun rose, a dew drop became aware of its surrondings.
sentences.chinese: 太陽昇起時，一顆露珠兒才知道了自己身處何處。

sentences.english: One Sunday morning the warm sun came up and–pop!
sentences.chinese: 星期天早上，暖和的太陽昇上來了。

sentences.english: The sun is up . Let'sgo to town.
sentences.chinese: 太陽昇起來了，我們去城裏吧。

definition: Minghe, rail station in South Taiwan/Meiwa (Japanese reign name 1764-1772)/Meiwa (common name for Japanese companies or schools)
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
Wan'an county in Ji'an 吉安, Jiangxi
Qi son of Yu the Great 禹[Yu3], reported founder of the Xia Dynasty 夏朝[Xia4 Chao2] (c. 2070-c. 1600 BC)
to open/to start/to initiate/to enlighten or awaken/to state/to inform
Changtai county in Zhangzhou 漳州[Zhang1 zhou1], Fujian
Tang emperor Xuanzong's 唐玄宗[Tang2 Xuan2 zong1] reign name used during the Kaiyuan era (713-741), a peak of Tang prosperity
